title: Goldilocks' Potatoes
ingredients: 2 lbs Yukon gold or other potatoes
directions: Mash potatoes. Add salt, pepper, and milk if desired.
Grease four 10-oz individual casseroles or custard cups.
Spoon the potato mixture into casseroles.
In a chilled medium mixing bowl, beat whipping cream with chilled beaters of an electric mixer o medium speed until soft peaks form. Fold in cheese.
Spoon cheese mixture over potatoes. Bake for 15 to 20 minutes until light brown.
